name: Business Case Template
description: Comprehensive business case template for project proposals and investment decisions
author: Document Writer Extension

variables.name: title
variables.description: Title of the business case
variables.placeholder: e.g., Implementation of Customer Management System

variables.name: author
variables.description: Author of the business case
variables.placeholder: e.g., John Smith, Project Manager

variables.name: date
variables.description: Date the business case was created
variables.placeholder: Current date will be used if not specified

variables.name: company
variables.description: Company name
variables.placeholder: e.g., ACME Corporation

variables.name: department
variables.description: Department requesting the project
variables.placeholder: e.g., Information Technology

variables.name: executiveSummary
variables.description: Brief executive summary of the business case
variables.placeholder: 2-3 paragraph summary highlighting the key points, investment required, and expected benefits

variables.name: currentSituation
variables.description: Description of the current business situation
variables.placeholder: Detailed description of the current state, processes, and systems

variables.name: problemDescription
variables.description: Clear description of the problem being addressed
variables.placeholder: Specific issues, pain points, and challenges that need to be resolved

variables.name: impactOfInaction
variables.description: Consequences of not implementing the solution
variables.placeholder: Risks, costs, and negative impacts if no action is taken

variables.name: stakeholdersAffected
variables.description: List of stakeholders impacted by the problem and solution
variables.placeholder: Departments, teams, customers, or external parties affected

variables.name: proposedSolution
variables.description: Detailed description of the proposed solution
variables.placeholder: Comprehensive overview of the recommended approach and solution

variables.name: keyFeatures
variables.description: Key features and capabilities of the solution
variables.placeholder: Bullet points or list of main features and functionalities

variables.name: benefits
variables.description: Expected benefits from implementing the solution
variables.placeholder: Quantifiable and qualitative benefits, improvements, and value

variables.name: alternatives
variables.description: Alternative solutions considered
variables.placeholder: Other options evaluated and reasons for not selecting them

variables.name: totalInvestment
variables.description: Total upfront investment required
variables.placeholder: e.g., 150000 (will be formatted as currency)

variables.name: annualCost
variables.description: Annual operating costs
variables.placeholder: e.g., 25000 (will be formatted as currency)

variables.name: projectedSavings
variables.description: Projected annual cost savings
variables.placeholder: e.g., 75000 (will be formatted as currency)

variables.name: roi
variables.description: Expected return on investment as decimal
variables.placeholder: e.g., 0.45 (will be formatted as 45%)

variables.name: paybackPeriod
variables.description: Time to recover the initial investment
variables.placeholder: e.g., 18 months, 2.5 years

variables.name: npv
variables.description: Net Present Value of the investment
variables.placeholder: e.g., 125000 (will be formatted as currency)

variables.name: risks
variables.description: Identified risks and their potential impact
variables.placeholder: List of risks with probability and impact assessment

variables.name: mitigation
variables.description: Risk mitigation strategies and contingency plans
variables.placeholder: Specific actions to minimize or eliminate identified risks

variables.name: duration
variables.description: Total project duration
variables.placeholder: e.g., 6 months, 1 year

variables.name: phases
variables.description: Implementation phases and their scope
variables.placeholder: Detailed breakdown of project phases with timelines

variables.name: milestones
variables.description: Key project milestones and deliverables
variables.placeholder: Critical checkpoints and deliverables with target dates

variables.name: humanResources
variables.description: Human resource requirements
variables.placeholder: Staff, skills, roles, and time commitments needed

variables.name: technology
variables.description: Technology and infrastructure requirements
variables.placeholder: Hardware, software, licenses, and technical resources

variables.name: budget
variables.description: Total budget allocation required
variables.placeholder: e.g., 200000 (will be formatted as currency)

variables.name: kpis
variables.description: Key Performance Indicators to measure success
variables.placeholder: Specific, measurable metrics to track project success

variables.name: measurementMethods
variables.description: Methods for measuring and tracking success
variables.placeholder: How KPIs will be measured, frequency, and reporting methods

variables.name: appendices
variables.description: Additional supporting documentation
variables.placeholder: References to additional documents, charts, technical specifications, etc.

sections.name: Title Page
sections.description: Cover page with project title, company, department, author, and date

sections.name: Executive Summary
sections.description: High-level overview of the business case

sections.name: Problem Statement
sections.description: Current situation, problem description, impact, and stakeholders

sections.name: Solution Overview
sections.description: Proposed solution, features, benefits, and alternatives

sections.name: ROI Analysis
sections.description: Financial analysis with investment, costs, savings, and returns

sections.name: Implementation Timeline
sections.description: Project duration, phases, and key milestones

sections.name: Resource Requirements
sections.description: Human resources, technology, and budget needs

sections.name: Success Metrics
sections.description: KPIs and measurement methods for tracking success

usageInstructions: Fill in all required variables before generating the document
Financial values should be entered as numbers (without currency symbols)
ROI should be entered as a decimal (e.g., 0.45 for 45%)
Dates will be automatically formatted using the formatDate helper
Use bullet points or numbered lists for multi-item fields
The template includes a professional financial analysis table
All sections are designed for comprehensive business case documentation
